QuestData.Title: One Traveler's Misfortune
QuestData.Description: Did you have to throw our supplies at them?! Why not use your weapon? Maybe fancy spells or kicks? Why the supplies?!$b$bNow we don't have enough to last us, especially with Nephew Bentnail here. His appetite is like a yeti's!$b$bYou threw it, you get us more. There is wreckage down the path. Maybe you will find supplies there.
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the Abandoned Wreckage for supplies.
QuestData.CompletionText: Nephew Bentnail has already eaten two days worth of food. I hope you found us more!
QuestData.RewardText: You were attacked by a mogu? That sounds terrible!$b$bI hate to ask, but did you manage to pick up any supplies while you were fighting for your life?$b$bNo?! This is very bad luck.

Objectives.Objective: Search the Abandoned Wreckage for supplies
